taskType.name: AVOSBeUnmerge
taskType.description: Unmerge an XREF record from a Base Object record.

taskType.name: AVOSBeFinalReview
taskType.description: Update a record and require the user to go through an approval process before completing the task.

taskType.name: AVOSBeUpdateRejectedRecord
taskType.description: Review a change and either escalate or reject it. This task does not provide an Approve option and requires at least one other person to review the changes as well.

taskType.name: AVOSBeReviewNoApprove
taskType.description: Update a record and require the user to go through an approval process before completing the task.

taskType.name: AVOSBeUpdate
taskType.description: Update a record and do not require the user to go through an approval process before completing the task. The approval step is optional.
